title: Start
body:
<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> Happy birthday Princess!
[[Next|2]]

<<setsprite Right Briar Rose neutral>>Thank you! Wow, I can't believe I'm already 18. How time flies!
[[Next|3]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> Can you believe it's also been eighteen years since we first became friends? We were practically inseparable back then!
[[Next|4]]

<<setsprite Right Briar Rose neutral>>And we still are now!
[[Next|5]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> Hey, wait here a second. I have a surprise for you!
[[Next|6]]

???: Princess Briar Rose...
[[Next|7]]

<<setsprite Right Briar Rose neutral>>Huh? Who said that?
[[Next|8]]

???: Come this way....
[[Next|9]]

???: A special surprise... for your birthday...
[[Next|10]]

<<setsprite Right Briar Rose neutral>>Oh wow, what a beautiful golden spinning wheel!
[[Next|11]]

<<setsprite Right Briar Rose neutral>>Well, don't mind if I do.
[[Next|12.5]]

???: FOOL!
[[Next|14]]

???: You thought I was a kind and helpful stranger, but it was I, Carabosse! The evil fairy prophesied to kill you!
[[Next|15]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> Princess, I'm back!
[[Next|16]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> Princess?
[[Next|17]]

<<setsprite Right Carabosse neutral>> Ohohohoho! Your princess is done for! The prophecy has come true!
[[Next|18]]

<<setsprite Right Carabosse neutral>> On her eighteenth birthday, the princess shall prick her finger on a cursed spinning wheel and sleep for all eternity!
[[Next|19]]

<<setsprite Right Carabosse neutral>> And it has come true, thanks to the skills of I, the evil fairy Carabosse! Ohohohohoho!
[[Next|20]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> Princess Briar Rose... Asleep for all eternity...?
[[Next|21]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> Not on my watch!
[[Next|22]]

<<setsprite Right Carabosse neutral>> You think you can stop me? A washed up little fairy from the north? Ha! Oh this is too good!
[[Next|23]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> Well if there's one thing I know, it's that there's one tried and true way to break any curse!
[[Next|24]]

<<setsprite Right Carabosse neutral>> Ha! Don't make me laugh! You know as well as I that the Princess hasn't dated.
[[Next|26]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> I'll find her true love! And bring him to her! And make him kiss her! And she'll wake up!
[[Next|25]]

<<setsprite Right Carabosse neutral>> But, just in case, I might as well kill all the princes in the kingdom. You know, to stop you from succeeding.
[[Next|26.5]]
<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> And I'll save all of the princes too! I have to follow Carabosse!

<<setsprite Right Briar Rose neutral>>Ow, I think I pricked my finger... *thud*
[[Next|13]]

<<setsprite Right Carabosse neutral>> Anyway, later.
[[Next|27]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>> Princess Briar Rose... I will wake you up...
[[Next|28]]
